title: Moonshine or Dirty Faces
description: In Li'l Warsaw career choices are limited. The coal mines and moonshining are the largest employers. Donnie and Antonio, best friends since childhood, have no interest in either occupation. They are happy with second tier jobs as a mechanic and store clerk. in this way they would have passed their mundane lives except for an encounter that changed their future. Suspected of witnessing a murder, they are thought of as loose ends. To protect themselves requires a career change. The slippery slope takes them farther into the world of violence and death.
author: Jack Sakalauskas
